data.actual_result: A "no log yet" screen quickly pops up.
data.expected_result: A smooth transition to all users.
data.short_description: When switching specific audit log filter to "all users", the "no logs yet" screen shows for a slight second (may need to try multiple times)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to an audit log - On the filters, go to "filter by users" and select anyone. - Then, go back to "all users".
